changes: Switched to panel_custom.async_register_panel to fix AttributeError in recent Home Assistant versions
Updated WhatsAppProxyView to forward to engine root for better UI/API proxying
Implemented dynamic sensor discovery for tracked contacts as per hass_component.md contract
Updated binary_sensor.py with connectivity class and last_seen attributes
Updated sensor.py with timestamp class for last_messaged
Refactored __init__.py for improved service handling and coordinator logic
Synchronized strings.json and translations with new config flow and services
